message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take 50000 and let's end this quickly.
I think we can both do better than that. Let's be fair. I'll take 950000, and you can have 50000.  This way, we can both get a decent amount, and we can end this quickly.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 900000 to 100000.  This way, you get more than in my previous offer, and we can finally wrap this up.
I'm willing to meet you halfway.  900000 for me, 100000 for you.  This is a fair deal, and it will allow us to end this quickly.
